Description:
With the death of Erekhal, there is no one left to lead the cult of the Burning Hand.

After your passage through Velkarath decimating their ranks and the death of their leader, the few remaining cultists flee, and the cult is dissolved.
DescriptionAction: Now you can take a little break and loot what's left at its base.
